title: KeyNotFoundException in GetWarningsToBeLoggedAsErrorsByProject
body:
https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/80b7f2dcb622333934826ebd008c61a1a2b7320b/src/Build/BackEnd/Components/Logging/LoggingService.cs#L544

the field has a single entry with a different key.

This is during a pretty regular multi-proc build
